entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Lunenburg
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:28 AM AST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lunenburg 07:00 AM AST Sunday 22 January 2023
Temperature: -4.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.1 kPa rising
Humidity: 87 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -6.4°C
Wind: NW 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h this afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 13 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning late this evening except rain along parts of the coast. Snowfall amount 5 cm except rainfall amount 5 mm along the coast. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Rain at times heavy or snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain at times heavy in the morning. Rain along parts of the coast early in the morning. Rainfall amount 30 to 40 mm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High plus 3. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Rain or snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Rain or snow. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Sunday 22 January 2023
